Sim Utilities¶

CommonAgeSpeciesUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for combinations of a Sims age and species.

Determine if a sim is older than the specified age.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to check.

  • age – The age to check with.

  • or_equal – If True, the age check will be older than or equal to. If False, the age check will be older than.

CommonBuffUtils¶

class CommonBuffUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for handling buffs on sims.

classmethod add_buff(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, *buff_ids: int, buff_reason: [<class 'int'>, <class 'str'>, protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString] = None) → bool¶

Add the specified buffs to a sim.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to add the specified buffs to.

  • buff_ids – The decimal identifiers of buffs to add.

  • buff_reason – The text that will display when the player hovers over the buffs. What caused the buffs to be added.

Returns

True if all of the specified buffs were successfully added.

classmethod get_buffs(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → List[buffs.buff.Buff]¶

Retrieve all buffs currently active on a sim.

classmethod has_buff(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, *buff_ids: int) → bool¶

Determine if any of the specified buffs are currently active on a sim.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim being checked.

  • buff_ids – The decimal identifiers of the Buffs being located.

Returns

True if the sim has any of the specified buffs.

classmethod has_fertility_boosting_buff(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if any fertility boosting buffs are currently active on a sim.

Fertility Boosting Buffs: - Fertility Potion - Fertility Potion Masterwork - Fertility Potion Normal - Fertility Potion Outstanding - Massage Table Fertility Boost - Massage Table Fertility Boost Incense

classmethod has_morning_person_buff(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if any Morning Person Trait buffs are currently active on a sim.

classmethod has_night_owl_buff(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if any Night Owl Trait buffs are currently active on a sim.

classmethod remove_buff(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, *buff_ids: int) → bool¶

Remove the specified buffs from a sim.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to remove the specified buffs from.

  • buff_ids – The decimal identifiers of buffs to remove.

Returns

True if all of the specified buffs were successfully removed.

class CommonHouseholdUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for manipulating households.

static add_sim_to_active_household(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, destroy_if_empty_household: bool = True) → bool¶

Add a Sim to the Active Sims household.

Add a Sim to the Target Sims household.

static create_empty_household(starting_funds: int = 0, as_hidden_household: bool = False) → sims.household.Household¶

Create an empty household.

static delete_household(household: sims.household.Household) → bool¶

Delete the specified household from the game.

static delete_households_with_name(name: str, allow_partial_match: bool = False) → bool¶

Delete all households with the specified name.

Parameters

  • name – The name of the households to delete.

  • allow_partial_match – If True, households only need to contain the name to match.

static get_active_household() → Optional[sims.household.Household]¶

Retrieve the Household of the Active Sim.

static get_active_household_id() → int¶

Retrieve an identifier for the Household of the Active Sim.

static get_all_households_generator() → Iterator[sims.household.Household]¶

Retrieve a collection of all households.

static get_free_household_slots(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → int¶

Retrieve the number of free household slots in the Household of the specified Sim. note:: Max household slots in vanilla Sims 4 is 8 sims.

Returns

The number of free household slots or -1 if no Household is found for the specified Sim.

static get_household(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → Optional[sims.household.Household]¶

Retrieve the household of a Sim.

static get_household_id(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → int¶

Retrieve an identifier for the Household a Sim is a part of.

static get_household_lot_id(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → int¶

Retrieve an identifier for the home lot of the specified Sim.

static get_sim_info_of_all_sims_in_active_household_generator() → Iterator[sims.sim_info.SimInfo]¶

Retrieve a collection of Sims that are a part of the active household.

static get_sim_info_of_all_sims_in_household_generator(household: sims.household.Household) → Iterator[sims.sim_info.SimInfo]¶

Retrieve a collection of Sims that are a part of the active household.

static has_free_household_slots(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if the Household of the specified Sim has any free Sim slots. note:: Max household slots in vanilla Sims 4 is 8 sims.

static has_household(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if the Sim is part of a Household.

static is_in_same_household(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if two Sims are in the same household.

static is_part_of_active_household(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim is part of the active household.

static locate_household_by_name(name: str, allow_partial_match: bool = False, create_on_missing: bool = False, starting_funds: int = 0, as_hidden_household: bool = False) → Optional[sims.household.Household]¶

Locate a household with the specified name.

Parameters

  • name – The name of a household to locate.

  • create_on_missing – If True, a household will be created if one isn’t found with the specified name.

  • starting_funds – If a household is created, this will be the starting funds of that household.

  • as_hidden_household – If True, the created household will be hidden.

  • allow_partial_match – If True, households only need to contain the name to match.

Returns

A Household with the specified name.

static locate_households_by_name_generator(name: str, allow_partial_match: bool = False) → Iterator[sims.household.Household]¶

Locate all households with the specified name.

Parameters

  • name – The name of the households to locate.

  • allow_partial_match – If True, households only need to contain the name to match.

Returns

A Household with the specified name.

static move_sim_to_household(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, household_id: int = None, destroy_if_empty_household: bool = True) → bool¶

Move a Sim to the specified household or a new household if no Household is specified.

CommonOccultUtils¶

class CommonOccultUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for handling sim occults.

static get_sim_info_of_all_occults_gen(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, *exclude_occult_types: sims.occult.occult_enums.OccultType) → Iterator[sims.sim_info.SimInfo]¶

Retrieve a generator of SimInfo objects for all Occults of a sim.

note:: Results include the occult type of the sim_info specified. If they are Human by default, the Human occult sim info will be included.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to locate Occults in

  • exclude_occult_types – A collection of OccultTypes to exclude from the resulting SimInfo list.

Returns

An iterator of SimInfo objects for all occult types of a sim.

static is_alien(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a sim is an Alien.

static is_currently_a_mermaid(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a sim is currently a Mermaid

note:: This only checks their occult status, it does not check for a visible Tail. Use :func: is_in_mermaid_form to check for a visible Tail.

static is_currently_a_vampire(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a sim is currently a Vampire

static is_currently_a_witch(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a sim is currently a Witch

static is_currently_an_alien(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a sim is currently an Alien

static is_currently_human(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a sim is currently Human (Not an Occult)

static is_ghost(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a sim is a Ghost.

static is_in_mermaid_form(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a sim is in Mermaid Form (The Sim has a visible Tail).

static is_mermaid(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a sim is a Mermaid

static is_mermaid_in_mermaid_form(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

CommonRelationshipUtils¶

class CommonRelationshipUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for managing relationship bits, tracks, etc.

static add_relationship_bit(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, relationship_bit_id: int) → bool¶

Add a relationship bit between two sims. note:: If the relationship bit is UNIDIRECTIONAL, it will only be added to sim_info in the direction of the Target. i.e. Sim will have relationship bit towards Target, but Target will not have relationship bit towards Sim. One example is the Caregiver relationship: - Sim is caregiver of Target. - Target is being cared for by Sim.

static calculate_average_relationship_level(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → float¶

Calculate an average level for Friendship and Romance between two Sims.

Math: (Friendship Level + Romance Level)/2

Example: Friendship Level: 10 Romance Level: 20 Average: 15

static change_relationship_level_of_sims(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, relationship_track_id: int, level: float) → bool¶

Change a relationship track level between two sims.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim that owns the relationship track.

  • target_sim_info – The target of the relationship track.

  • relationship_track_id – The relationship track to change.

  • level – The amount to add to the relationship track (Can be positive or negative).

Returns

True if the relationship track was changed successfully.

static get_friendship_level(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → float¶

Retrieve the level of Friendship between two Sims.

static get_relationship_level_of_sims(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, relationship_track_id: int) → float¶

Retrieve the level of a relationship track between two sims.

static get_romance_level(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → float¶

Retrieve the level of Romance between two Sims.

static get_sim_info_of_all_sims_romantically_committed_to_generator(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, instanced_only: bool = True) → Iterator[sims.sim_info.SimInfo]¶

Retrieve a SimInfo object for all Sims romantically committed with the specified Sim.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The Sim to locate romantically involved Sims with.

  • instanced_only – If True, only Sims that are currently loaded will be returned.

static get_sim_info_of_all_sims_with_relationship_bit_generator(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, relationship_bit_id: int, instanced_only: bool = True) → Iterator[sims.sim_info.SimInfo]¶

Retrieve an Iterator of SimInfo for all Sims that have the specified relationship bit with the specified Sim.

note:: For UNIDIRECTIONAL relationship bits, the direction is sim_info has relationship bit with target_sim_info Caregiver example: The Caregiver has a relationship bit pointed at Toddler (The Caregiver would show “caregiving ward” when hovering over the Toddler in the relationships panel) The Toddler would NOT have the relationship bit. Sim is Caregiver of Toddler.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The Sim to locate relationship bits on.

  • relationship_bit_id – The identifier of the relationship bit to locate connections with.

  • instanced_only – If True, only Sims that are currently loaded will be returned.

static get_sim_info_of_all_sims_with_relationship_bits_generator(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, relationship_bit_ids: Iterator[int], instanced_only: bool = True) → Iterator[sims.sim_info.SimInfo]¶

Retrieve an Iterator of SimInfo for all Sims that have the specified relationship bits with the specified Sim.

note:: For UNIDIRECTIONAL relationship bits, the direction is sim_info has relationship bit with target_sim_info

Caregiver example: The Caregiver has a relationship bit pointed at Toddler (The Caregiver would show “caregiving ward” when hovering over the toddler in the relationships panel) The toddler would NOT have the relationship bit. Sim is Caregiver of Toddler.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The Sim to locate relationship bits on.

  • relationship_bit_ids – A collection of identifiers for relationship bits to locate connections with.

  • instanced_only – If True, only Sims that are currently loaded will be returned.

static has_met(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim has met the Target Sim.

static has_positive_romantic_combo_relationship_bit_with(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim has a positive romantic combo with the Target Sim.

static has_relationship_bit_with_any_sims(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, relationship_bit_id: int, instanced_only: bool = True) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim has the specified relationship bit with any Sims.

static has_relationship_bit_with_sim(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, relationship_bit_id: int) → bool¶

Determine if two sims have the specified relationship bit with each other.

static has_relationship_bits_with_any_sims(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, relationship_bit_ids: Iterator[int], instanced_only: bool = True) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim has the specified relationship bits with any Sims.

static has_relationship_bits_with_sim(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, relationship_bit_ids: Iterator[int]) → bool¶

Determine if two sims have any of the specified relationship bits with each other.

static is_romantically_committed_to(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim is romantically committed to the Target Sim.

static is_romantically_committed_to_any_sims(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if the Sim is romantically committed to any Sims.

static remove_relationship_bit(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, relationship_bit_id: int) → bool¶

Remove a relationship bit between two sims.

note:: If the relationship bit is UNIDIRECTIONAL, it will only be removed from sim_info in the direction of the Target.

i.e. Sim will have no longer have relationship bit towards Target, but Target will still have relationship bit towards Sim. One example is the Caregiver relationship: - Sim is caregiver of Target. - Target is being cared for by Sim.

CommonSimTypeUtils¶

class CommonSimTypeUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for determining the type of a Sim. i.e. Player, NPC, Service, etc.

static is_non_player_sim(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim is a Non Player Sim. note:: An NPC Sim is a sim that is not a part of the active household.

static is_played_sim(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim is a Played Sim. note:: This does not indicate whether or not a Sim is a Player Sim or Non Player Sim.

static is_player_sim(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim is a Player Sim. note:: A Player Sim is a sim that is a part of the active household.

static is_service_sim(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo) → bool¶

Determine if a Sim is a Service Sim.

Service Sims: - Butler - Chalet - City Repair - Forest Ranger - Gardener - Grim Reaper - Maid - Mailman - Massage Therapist - Master Fisherman - Master Gardener - Master Herbalist - Nanny - Pizza Delivery - Repairman - Restaurant Critic - Statue Busker

Determine if a pet sim can reproduce.

Use can_not_impregnate and can_not_be_impregnated for Human Sims. note:: Will return False if the pet sim has the PREGNANCY_OPTIONS_PET_CAN_REPRODUCE trait.

static remove_trait(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, *trait_ids: int) → bool¶

Remove the specified traits from a sim.

Parameters

  • sim_info – The sim to remove the specified traits from.

  • trait_ids – The decimal identifier of the trait being removed.

Returns

True if the trait was successfully removed from the sim.

static remove_trait_from_all_sims(trait_id: int, include_sim_callback: Callable[[sims.sim_info.SimInfo], bool] = None)¶

Remove a trait from all Sims that match the specified include filter.

Parameters

  • trait_id – The Trait to remove from all Sims.

  • include_sim_callback – Only sims that match this filter will have the Trait removed.

static swap_traits(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, trait_id_one: int, trait_id_two: int) → bool¶

Remove one trait and add another to a Sim.

note:: If trait_id_one exists on the Sim, it will be removed and trait_id_two will be added. note:: If trait_id_two exists on the Sim, it will be removed and trait_id_one will be added.
